mapper.update: UPDATE PX_SIGN_UP SET PX_ORG_ID=#{pxOrgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PX_COURSE_ID=#{pxCourseId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AAC001=#{aac001,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, AAE011=#{aae011,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AAE017=#{aae017,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AAE036=#{aae036,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AAE019=#{aae019,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AAE020=#{aae020,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_UP_STATUS=#{signUpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCZY06=#{cczy06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CHECK=#{isCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CONTACT=#{isContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE PX_SIGN_UP_ID=#{pxSignUpId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) count from px_sign_up s where s.PX_COURSE_ID = #{id}
SELECT count(*) as "count" from px_sign_up s where s.AAC001 = #{userId} and s.PX_COURSE_ID=#{courseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PX_SIGN_UP SET IS_CHECK='0' where IS_CHECK IS NULL
UPDATE PX_SIGN_UP SET IS_CONTACT='0' where IS_CONTACT IS NULL
